Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Vincennes
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 115th, Wentworth, 111th, Halsted & 115th, due to street blockage near 115th/Vincennes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Michigan, 115th, Wentworth, 111th, Halsted, then resume their normal route on 115th, due to street blockage near 115th/Vincennes.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #18 16th-18th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 16th/Kilbourn
ShortDescription: Eastbound 18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via 16th, 47th Court, Cicero, Roosevelt, Kostner & 16th, due to, street blockage near 16th/Kilbourn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via 16th, 47th Court, Cicero, Roosevelt, Kostner, then resume their normal route on 16th, due to street blockage near 16th/Kilbourn.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 16th/Kilbourn
ShortDescription: EB 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Cicero, Roosevelt, Kostner & Cermak,  due to street blockage near16th/Kilbourn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Cicero, Roosevelt, Kostner, then resume their normal route on Cermak,  due to street blockage near16th/Kilbourn.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
